text: Francesc "Paco" Betriu Cabeceran (18 January 1940 - 7 October 2020) was a Spanish movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Organyà, Spain. Betriu was known for directing and writing the screenplay for The Time of the Doves, Sinatra and Monica del Raval. Betriu died on 7 October 2020 at the age of 80.Muere el director de cine Francesc Betriu, a los 80 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish movie directors Category:Spanish screenwriters
title: Francesc Betriu
